title: Leclerc2019
author: Leclerc2019
created_time: December 05, 2023, 10:13:43 PMLast edit: January 21, 2024, 01:38:04 AM by Leclerc2019
content: ============================== Formula Bounty chat ==============================To participate you need a ERC-20 WalletNO KYCBOUNTY POOL = 2500 USDT + 2500$ IN TOKENS:• Telegram – 10%• Twitter – 15%• Facebook – 10%• Instagram – 10%• Reddit – 10%• Blog – 15%• Youtube – 15%• Memes – 10%• Referral – 10%===========================================================================GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:•  If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.•  Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.•  If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will not be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.•  Disqualified members will lose the entire coins earned and this is irrevocable.•  The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.•  The coins will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.•  Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and the only way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.•  You can keep your work post in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).•  Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.•  We will update the stakes [weekly].•  Participant must register on the app.•  Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity•  Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on apple,Stakes will be paid depending on posts (at the start of the campaign). 5 posts per week: 1 stake10 posts per week: 2 stake15 posts per week: 3 stake20 posts per week: 4 stake25+ posts per week: 5 stake Rules:  1. You must join the Telegram group: https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews2. You must write at least 5 messages a week about the project (message must relate to the COINTACTED) and conduct a dialogue with the participants in the project telegram chat.3. You are not allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the chat.4. The words "hi, hello, bye, goodbye, etc." are not counted.5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the telegram!6. You should not have the name of another project in the profile name.7. Once a week, you must send a report in the form.8. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Just write to us in telegram (@wehrlein31 or @kateee110)9. Participant must register on the app.10. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity11. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on apple Code:Week # : Telegram Profile Link Spreadsheet #: Amount of posts per week:  Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join the Telegram group:https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews2. Each Participant should join the official Twitter: https://x.com/cointacted3. Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign.4. Report should be 5 minimum Retweet and 1 Tweet with the #COINTACTED #AIRDROP #Crypto #BINANCE5. Tweet must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.6. All report must be on time or else you will get 0.7. If you have no new posts from our official Twitter account, kindly make a short post about COINTACTED and use all of our official hashtag.8. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.9. Participant must register on the app.10. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity11. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on apple[/b]Code:Week # :Twitter Profile LinkFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]Retweet[/b]1.2.3.4.5.[b]Tweet [/b]1.Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join the Telegram group:https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews2.   Participants must share and like COINTACTED posts.3.   Participants must like and subscribe to COINTACTED Facebook page https://facebook.com/cointacted4.   Shares must have a link to the COINTACTED website and Telegram group5.   Use hashtags:#COINTACTED #AIRDROP #Crypto #BTC YOU MUST INCLUDE THESE IN YOUR posts/shares, otherwise they won't be counted.6.   Accounts with fake friends/followers will be disqualified7.   Friends/followers will NOT be updated after having registered in the campaign8.   All shared articles must also be liked9.   Please DO NOT post rubbish comments, it is neither necessary nor wanted.10.   If you have no new posts from our official Facebook account, kindly make a short post about COINTACTED and use all of our official hashtag.11.   Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.12.   You have to like as well as share our posts. Minimum 5 per week.13. Participant must register on the app.14. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity15. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on apple[/b]Code:Week # :Facebook Profile LinkFriends:Spreadsheet #:[b]Post[/b]1.2.3.4.5.[b]Repost [/b]1.Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join the Telegram group:https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews2. Each Participant should join the official page : https://instagram.com/cointacted_com3. Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign.4. At least 5 likes and 5 comments per photo per week.5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the instagram!6. DON'T WRITE ABOUT THE PROJECT LIKE A BOT. (Example: "COINTACTED project will be implemented in the crypto world. Believe in its potential, let's support this great team!" COINTACTED project has many futures. I can definitely say that this company will show great results!"7. DO NOT USE HASHTAGS IN YOUR COMMENTS8. Due to the fact that many break the rules, we had to introduce an interview. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Just write to us in telegram (@wehrlein31 or @kateee110)9. Participant must register on the app.10. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity11. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on apple Code:Week # :INSTAGRAM ProfileFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]LIKE+COMMENT[/b]1.2.3.4.5.Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign).30-60 post karma/ comment karma : 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma : 2 stake per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stake per week301+ post karma/ comment karma : 4 stake per weekRules:1. We reserve the right to not consider your Reddit account eligible if you are extremely low quality/bot etc.2. Your account must be at least 2 months old and have at least 50 posts or comment karma.3. External posts must link to the COINTACTED website.4. Posts with negative karma will obviously not be accepted. Any kind of spam will not be rewarded either.5. Your post must be made in one of the following subreddit: r/cryptomoonshots, r/altcoin, r/defi and etc.6. We will award tokens based on the quality of the post. This will be based on the quality of the content, a number of upvotes, karma and how many comments it generates etc. We may take other criteria into account.7. Post must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.8. You can complete a total of 7 posts per week. A maximum of 2 posts per day.9. Low-quality contents will be denied without pay.10. You must join the Telegram group:https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews11. Participant must register on the app.12. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity13. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on appleCode:Week # : Reddit Profile Link:Carma:  Spreadsheet #: Links of Reddit posts:1.2.3.4. We divide all kinds of content, including articles, blog posts into 3 categories:Excellent : 36 stakesVery good : 24 stakesGood : 12 stakesRules:1. You can use our official images, logos, graphics on our website.2. Articles should contain at least 500 characters.3. The article or description of the video should contain at least 1 link to our website. At least 1 link to your BTT profile should be indicated in the article or description of the video to prove your authorship.4. Only 5 posts from one user are accepted on the blogging platforms, like "Medium", "Steemit", etc.5. Articles must be interesting and aim to build this project.6. You must join the Telegram group:https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews7. Participant must register on the app.8. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity9. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on apple[/b]Best Video: 72 stakesGood Video: 48 stakesMedium Video: 24 stakesLow Video : 12 stakes Rules:1. You must join the Telegram group:https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews2. Each participant must subscribe to the official account https://www.youtube.com/@cointacted3. Video must be 2 minutes long.4. Videos must include link to the official website in the description.5. Must have your BitcoinTalk username in the description.6. Video mustbe published on a crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 150 subscribers.7. Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered as an invalid submission.8. We would accept any positive video about COINTACTED, not only about the ICO, but about the idea itself, use cases, benefits, ICO etc.9. No more than two videos from one person.10. Participant must register on the app.11. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity12. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on apple[/b]Rules:1. You need to be registered on the ecosystem.2. Go to -> cointacted.com/create-meme and create a meme about COINTACTED and share it at least on Twitter with your followers.3. Tag @cointacted in your tweet.4. Memes per participant allowed during entire campaign period.5. Memes must be original. Do not share other's memes.6. Votes on memes on the app will show and decide the best memes and winners.7. Join Telegram group https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews8. Participant must register on the app.9. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity10. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on appleRules:1. Join Telegram group https://t.me/cointacted and https://t.me/cointactednews2. Register here https://cointacted.com/account/3. Login and go to -> Dashboard -> Coins -> Referrals, copy your referral URL and invite friends4. We track referrals such as visits, registrations and purchases. Top10 referrers will share 10% of entire bounty pool.5. Participant must register on the app.6. Participant must like each post on activity, starting from new year. cointacted.com/activity7. Participant must give 5 stars for the app either on google play or on apple=========================WEEK 1 (05.12-11.12)=========================

comments.author: Leclerc2019
comments.body: ADDITIONAL INSTANT REWARDS AND WAYS TO EARN:Cointacted platform allows to earn CCENT for activities, content and achievements.List of all instant rewards:1 CCENT for update any post field with any value 1 time1 CCENT for publish an activity post 1 time (limited to 3 per day)1 CCENT for reply to an activity post 1 time (limited to 2 per day)1 CCENT for get a reply on an activity post 1 time (limited to 2 per day)1 CCENT for get a favorite on an activity post 1 time (limited to 1 per day)1 CCENT for get a follower 1 time (limited to 3 per day)1 CCENT for create a new forum 1 time (limited to 1 per week)1 CCENT for create a new topic 1 time (limited to 1 per day)1 CCENT for reply to a topic 1 time (limited to 2 per day)1 CCENT for get a reply in a topic 1 time (limited to 1 per day)1 CCENT for get a reply in a topic 1 time (limited to 1 per day)1 CCENT for get a new favorite on a topic 1 time (limited to 1 per day)1 CCENT for accept a friendship request 1 time (limited to 1 per day)1 CCENT for get a friendship request accepted 1 time (limited to 1 per day)10 CCENTS for create a group 1 time (limited to 1 per year)1 CCENT for join a group 1 time (limited to 1 per month)1 CCENT for publish an activity post in a group 1 time (limited to 1 per week)1 CCENT for get accepted on a private group 1 time (limited to 1 per month)1 CCENT for invite someone to join a group 1 time (limited to 1 per month)3 CCENTS for get promoted as moderator/administrator of a group 1 time (limited to 1 per month)2 CCENTS for promote another member to moderator/administrator of a group 1 time (limited to 1 per month)1 CCENT for send/Reply to a private message 1 time (limited to 1 per week)2 CCENTS for change cover image 1 time (limited to 1 per month)5 CCENTS for complete 70% of your profile2 CCENTS for get a referral sign up 1 time2 CCENTS for register to website through a referral 1 time5 CCENTS for reach 10 referral sign ups25 CCENTS for reach 50 referral sign ups50 CCENTS for reach 100 referral sign ups250 CCENTS for reach 500 referral sign ups500 CCENTS for reach 1000 referral sign ups2500 CCENTS for reach 5000 referral sign ups5000 CCENTS for reach 10000 referral sign ups2 CCENT for get a referral sale 1 time1 CCENT for log in to website 1 time (limited to 1 per day)1 CCENT for daily visit 3 newspaper articles (limited to 1 per day)3 CCENTS for make a new purchase 1 time2 CCENTS for review a product 1 time1 CCENT for comment on a newspaper article 1 time (limited to 1 per day)1 CCENT for publish a new newspaper article 1 time (limited to 1 per day)2 CCENTS for publish a new meme 1 time (limited to 1 per day)2 CCENTS for publish a new event 1 time (limited to 1 per week)1 CCENT for publish a new story 1 time (limited to 2 per day)The above rewards may change, you can see the actual list anytime here: cointacted.com/aboutcoin under Earning Tokens -> Actual Rewards. 2. Referrals purchases - when referred user puchases anything within the entire ecosystem, you get 1% commission. Including the marketplace, all future platforms of the infrastructure, and CTED Seed sale too.
